channel.title: Comments on: Recreating D-Day Scene With 4 People And A Camera

item.title: By: Josiah
item.dc:creator: Josiah
item.description: This is very cool, thanks for finding this and sharing. SPR was an amazing movie and all the more amazing considering the lack of SFX. Makes the talent of the actors and director really show.
item.content:encoded: This is very cool, thanks for finding this and sharing. SPR was an amazing movie and all the more amazing considering the lack of SFX. Makes the talent of the actors and director really show.
